description: The accent chair is a common furniture item upholstered with polyester (PET) fabric over polyester (PET) batting wrapped around a flexible polyurethane foam cushion over a wood frame with wood legs.
short desc: The accent chair is a common furniture item upholstered with polyester (PET) fabric over polyester (PET) batting wrapped around a flexible polyurethane foam cushion over a wood frame with wood legs.
source: Chairs were purchased from a national furniture manufacturer and distributor.
